description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery...
full_summary:
## Canopy Cleaning
### Nettoyage des hottes de cuisine

#### Tender Information

**Reference Number:** WS4096292798-Doc4099946933

**Amendment Number:** 1

**Solicitation Number:** WS4096292798

**Publication Date:** 2023-07-14

**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-08-03T14:00:00 (Eastern Daylight Time)

**Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-08-18

**Expected Contract End Date:** 2028-05-31

#### Description of Work

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites proposals for the provision of canopy cleaning services.

The contract involves the cleaning of culinary canopies at various locations in Ontario (except National Capital Region). Bidders are required to provide detailed technical specifications and pricing for the services.

#### Evaluation Criteria

Proposals will be evaluated based on the Client's assessment of the bidder's ability to meet the requirements of the solicitation.

#### Amendment Details

The closing time for bid submission has been amended to August 3, 2023, 2:00 PM EDT. Late bids will be declared non-responsive.

#### Important Information

* This tender is open to bidders from countries that have signed a trade agreement with Canada.
* The procurement category is Service (SRV).
* The tender type is Request for Proposal (RFP).

#### Contact Information

For more information, please visit Ariba Discovery at:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/16878763?extsite=MTY4Nzg3NjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Contact Jessica Canas, TSAGC/PSPC, at jessica.canas@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca for any questions or concerns.

#### Evaluation Criteria

The Client will evaluate proposals on the basis of the bidder's technical merit and price. The proposal with the highest combined score will be successful.
